graph.topic: Nowadays there are more opportunities for women than there were in the past

nodes.text: This, contrary to some ideas, is a positive progress in human society
the fairness between males and females is inevitable in such a developed society
Gone are the days when women could do nothing rather than stick to boring house work and take care of children
Women nowadays are much more active
they may be successful businessmen, they join the political world, they become scientists and so on
the "weaker" gender as often be thought has enough right as well as ability to contribute to the development of human beings just like any other men
they even perform better in some fields
the revolution in females' right has brought about many benefits not only to themselves but society as well
The financial burden of families, for instance, has decreased significantly with both the wives and the husbands working to earn money
women have the outstanding instinct to take up some careers lie healthcare or human resource management due to their patience and elaboration
women should find the best way to overcome such challenges
under many circumstances, women find it difficult to balance their work and their traditional role as the wives
children might enjoy less care from parents as they arre both busy with theit work
everything has it upside and downside
such changes do lead to some negative results like an upward trend in divorce rate
in a society where females are given equal opportunities compared with males would obviously enjoy lots of benefits far outweighing its obstacles
